name: playcanvas-editor-ts-esm-template
author: Piggspigg <piggspigg@github.com>
description: An ESM extension to the official TypeScript template for PlayCanvas that can also sync with your playcanvas.com project

scripts.postbuild-push:esm: npm --silent run postbuild:esm && npm --silent run push
scripts.build-push:debug: npm --silent run build:debug && npm --silent run push
scripts.build-push:release: npm --silent run build:release && npm --silent run push
scripts.watch-push:debug: npm --silent run build:debug && tsc-watch -p tsconfig.debug.json --onSuccess "npm --silent run postbuild-push:esm"
scripts.watch-push:release: npm --silent run build:release && tsc-watch -p tsconfig.release.json --onSuccess "npm --silent run postbuild-push:esm"
